Detailed Description

A read-only ColumnVectorAlias class.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The ColumnVectorAliasConstant class provides all the functionality from the MatrixAliasConstant class, but add specific functions intended for column vectors.

Definition at line 1701 of file matrix.h.

ColumnVectorAliasConstant::ColumnVectorAliasConstant (  const double *  data,
const unsigned int  size
)  [inline]
 

Default constructor.Pointer constructor.

To create a read-only column vector that will access a pre-available data array.

Parameters:
data Pointer to data array. This will be the data storage for the matrix.
size Number of rows the matrix has.
